Topic.Title: Packager plays audio events only once

Posts.EditableText: Hi there, new user here. Just packaged a small test game and noticed that when triggering a simple audio event, the packaged game will play it once, but if the same trigger is then input again, it will not play it again. Obviously the non-packaged game will repeat the audio as intended. Searched the forum and couldn't find any note on this bug, and was wondering if anyone had some insight on this. Bug happens with both .wav and .mp3 files. Thanks! EDIT: this also happens with scripts that play audio upon entering a room. it will play the first time, but if the player leaves and returns, the audio fails to play

I will fix the bug in v4.1.3.
